body_html:
I'm getting it on Tesla K40:

2018-04-11 18:28:02.715560: E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_event.cc:49] Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_LAUNCH_FAILED
2018-04-11 18:28:02.715614: F tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_event_mgr.cc:203] Unexpected Event status: 1
Process exited with return code -6.

tensorflow-gpu==1.4.0 installed with pip
CUDA 8.0
cudNN 6.0.21
compute capability 3.7
python 3.5.2

Linux CentOS kernel 3.10.0-693.11.6.el7.x86_64

body:
I'm getting it on Tesla K40:

```
2018-04-11 18:28:02.715560: E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_event.cc:49] Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_LAUNCH_FAILED
2018-04-11 18:28:02.715614: F tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_event_mgr.cc:203] Unexpected Event status: 1
Process exited with return code -6.
```

tensorflow-gpu==1.4.0 installed with pip
CUDA 8.0
cudNN 6.0.21
compute capability 3.7
python 3.5.2

Linux CentOS kernel 3.10.0-693.11.6.el7.x86_64
